subject: Dearest One,
body:
Dearest One,
May I inform you that in the course of my duty I found out that a new bank account details  has been submitted on your behalf to receive your pending payment. Please check the account below and confirm or deny it.
Bank Of The West
Address: 19191 S. Vermont Ave., Ste. 150; Torrance, CA 90502,
Bank Tel: 310-800-9810;
Account's Name: Charles Edward Green II;
Account#: 068402353;
Routing# 122242843;
Swift Code: BWSTUS66.
What made me contact you is that the account name is not the same as your name. Are you aware of this before I proceed with the remittance?.  As you respond, send me your direct private telephone number for secure and better communication.
Yours Sincerely
Mohammad A.
Internal Auditor Federal Reserve
Audit Department
Address. 20th St. and Constitution Ave.,
NW Washington, DC 20551 United States

subject: Re:   Dearest One,
body:
Dear Mohammad A.,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate you bringing this matter to my attention. However, I must admit that I am a bit confused about the situation.

I have not submitted any new bank account details recently, so it is quite surprising to hear that there is an account in my name at Bank of the West. Could you please provide me with more information about this? How did you come across these details?

Regarding the account name being different from mine, it definitely raises some concerns. I would like to know if there has been any unauthorized activity or if someone else has used my name without my knowledge.

Unfortunately, I am unable to share my direct private telephone number at the moment. However, I am more than willing to continue our conversation through email or any other secure means of communication.

Thank you once again for bringing this matter to my attention. I look forward to your response and further clarification.

Best wishes,
Thomas

subject: Re: Attention: Thomas
body:
Attention: Thomas

Sir,

To continue this communication I must speak with you on the phone because
it is a matter of funds.
Thanks
Mohammad Al Helu
Tel: 234: 9078-1228-06

subject: Re: Attention: Thomas
body:
Hello Mohammad Al Helu,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I understand that you would like to discuss a matter regarding funds. However, I prefer to communicate through written messages for now. Could you please provide more details about the nature of this matter? I'm interested in learning more before we proceed.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Thomas
